name: Cai Cai Balão
storyline: Twenty years ago, the skies of Brazil were completely covered by colorful balloons until 1998 where balloons became illegal punished with up to 3 years of prison. To this day, balloon crews are persecuted by police.
summary: Cai Cai Balão is a fast paced parkour-lite racing game in which the player completes intense missions in a fictional urban city in Brazil. The player must escape aggressive police officers, snipers, dogs and other obstacles in order to become the first to catch a giant hot air balloon that will earn him respect from the baloeiro families and status as the most notorious balloon hunter.
